addon.name: Kodi Libretro Buildbot Game Addons LE ARMHF

extension.name: Kodi Libretro Buildbot Game Addons LE ARMHF

extension.summary: Kodi Libretro Buildbot Game Addons LE ARMHF
extension.description: Kodi Libretro Buildbot Game Addons is a repository that builds kodi game binary addons directly from the libretro buildbot for LibreElec ARMHF (RPi/Amlogic) systems
